summary: The English gentleman known as Horse, returns to the American west to save his adopted Indian tribe from extinction.
cast: Richard Harris|Gale Sondergaard|Geoffrey Lewis|William Lucking|Jorge Luke|Jorge Russek|Claudio Brook|Enrique Lucero|Regino Herrera|Pedro Damián|Humberto López|Alberto Mariscal|Eugenia Dolores|Patricia Reyes Spíndola|Ana De Sade|Susan Dury|Rigobert Rico
title: La venganza de un hombre llamado Caballo
